title: Uniform constant-depth threshold circuits for division and iterated multiplication
venue: Journal of computer and system sciences (Print)

tldr.text: It is shown that division lies in the complexity class FOM + POW obtained by augmenting FOM with a predicate for powering modulo small primes, and that the predicate POW itself lies in FOM.
